channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiExtender
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiExtender

item.title: CVE-2024-23663|2024-07-09T17:44:51.463Z -- fortinet -- fortiextender
item.description: An improper access control in Fortinet FortiExtender 4.1.1 - 4.1.9, 4.2.0 - 4.2.6, 5.3.2, 7.0.0 - 7.0.4, 7.2.0 - 7.2.4 and 7.4.0 - 7.4.2 allows an attacker to create users with elevated privileges via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-23663|2024-07-09T15:33:31.512Z -- fortinet -- fortiextender
item.description: An improper access control in Fortinet FortiExtender 4.1.1 - 4.1.9, 4.2.0 - 4.2.6, 5.3.2, 7.0.0 - 7.0.4, 7.2.0 - 7.2.4 and 7.4.0 - 7.4.2 allows an attacker to create users with elevated privileges via a crafted HTTP request.
